remarks: Scalar multiplication in the module endomorphism algebra.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Sep-2015.)
statement:

mendvscafval $p |- ( .s ` A ) = ( x e. K , y e. B |-> ( ( E X. { x } ) oF .x. y ) ) $.

$d M x y $.
